item.title: Generate QR Code in Java using ZXing
item.description: Introduction In this tutorial, we are going to learn how to generate QR code (abbreviated from Quick Response code) in a Java application. We will use ZXing (“zebra crossing”) library which is the most popular library to generate QR code in Java. (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({}); Add ZXing library to the project To use ZXing Java library in the Gradle build project, add the following dependencies into the build.
